alert.note: Alert for West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 15 at 3:06PM PDT until March 16 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow continued above 4000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Cascade mountains of Whatcom and Skagit Counties, including the Mount Baker Ski Area, Cascade mountains of Pierce and Lewis Counties, including the Crystal Mountain Ski Area, Paradise on Mount Rainier, and Cascade mountains of Snohomish and King Counties, including, Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slopes North Cascades and Passes; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes; West Slopes South Central Cascades and Passes
